data.text: Eka Zofar ja-Namath nodwoko niya,
“Pacha chuna ni nyaka adwoki
Asewinjo kwer mikwerago, manyisa ni ichaya,
“Ingʼeyo maber chal gik moko nyaka aa chon,
ni tingʼruok ma joma timbegi richo tingʼorego rumo piyo,
Kata bed ni sungane chopo nyaka e polo
to ibiro yweye molal nono mana ka buru;
Olal nono mana ka lek,
Wenge ma yande nene ok nochak onene;
Nyithinde nyaka dwok gik mane okwalo kuom jodhier,
Tekone duto kaka ngʼama pod tin
“Kata obedo ni richo mitne e dhoge
kata obedo ni ok onyal pogore kode
to chiembe biro lokore makech gie iye;
Nyasaye biro ngʼulo mwandu mane omwonyo oko;
Obiro nyodho kwiri mag thuonde madongo;
Ok enobed mangima
Gik mane oyudo kuom tichne matek obiro weyo
Nikech ne othiro joma odhier, kendo nomayogi gigegi
“Adier, ok obi yudo yweyo kuom gombone malach;
Onge gima odongʼne makoro onyalo yako;
Kata bed ni oseyako mwandu mangʼeny kamano;
Kosechiemo moyiengʼ,
Kata otem ringo mondo otony ne gir lweny molos gi chuma,
Opudho asereno mondo owuog oko gi yo ka die ngʼeye,
nikech mwandune duto oserumo.
Polo biro bedo janeno kuom timbene mamono duto;
Ohula maduongʼ biro yweyo ode mi dhigo, adier,
Mano e gima Nyasaye ochano ne joma timbegi richo,
